dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5700 IH: To designate the community based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs located at 310 Home Boulevard in Galesburg, Illinois, as the “Lane A. Evans VA Community Based Outpatient Clinic”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Bustos (for herself, Ms. Schakowsky, Mr. Shimkus, Mr. Quigley, Mr. Lipinski, Mr. Rush, Ms. Duckworth, Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois, Mr. Enyart, Mr. Foster, Mr. Gutiérrez, Ms. Kelly of Illinois, Mr. Kinzinger of Illinois, Mr. Danny K. Davis of Illinois, Mr. Schock, Mr. Schneider, Mr. Hultgren, and Mr. Roskam) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the community based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs located at 310 Home Boulevard in Galesburg, Illinois, as the Lane A. Evans VA Community Based Outpatient Clinic.

section.header: Lane A. Evans VA Community Based Outpatient Clinic

subsection.text: The community based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs located at 310 Home Boulevard in Galesburg, Illinois, shall be known and designated as the Lane A. Evans VA Community Based Outpatient Clinic.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the community based outpatient clinic referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Lane A. Evans VA Community Based Outpatient Clinic.
